item.description:
We live on the northshore and it's not easily accessible by T. There is a bus that runs once an hour from Wonderland Station if you're that intrepid! Let me know if you need MBTA directions.

 

We are a household with birds and a rabbit for those who may have allergies to fur, feathers, aspen shavings, and/or hay dust. The birds will be in a different room but the rabbit will not. She may even come out and greet everyone like last time since that went well. There is on street parking available.

If you'd like to bring a snack to share, that would be much appreciated but not required. We will have some sort of meal items for dinnertime, depending on what our CSA gives us.  If it's not enough we are close to several restaurants with reasonably priced food.

 

In addition to boardgames,if there is interest, we can play party games on the Wii or PS3 like Mario Kart, Mario Party, Rayman Raving Rabids, Fat Princess, etc. Nothing like trying to see who can throw Bessie the cow the furthest or trying to run Becki off the road!! ;)

End time for this is Sunday, 11:00 pm. 

Address will be emailed to those attending as of Saturday.
item.name: Play games at Josh and Kieran's House, II
